articles.title: LANDSEA HOMES CLOSES ON 78 HOMESITES IN THE MOONLIGHT MASTER- PLANNED COMMUNITY IN MARICOPA, ARIZONA
articles.summary: Landsea Homes (Nasdaq: LSEA) announced it has closed on 78 homesites in the Moonlight master-planned community in Maricopa, Arizona. The company plans to offer single- and two-story homes featuring High Performance Home features including smart home automation technology (Apple Home™ environment) and energy savings. This expansion aims to meet the demand for quality, energy-efficient homes in the fast-growing Maricopa area, with sales expected to launch this summer.

articles.title: Rob Arnott on Deep Value and ‘Running Towards Lions’
articles.summary: Rob Arnott, founder of Research Affiliates, discusses his deep-value NIXT ETF which invests in underperforming, deleted stocks, aiming to capitalize on their greater upside potential compared to frothy, expensive additions to indexes. He emphasizes the importance of diversification into cheap alternatives, even if uncomfortable, and views the financial advisor's role as guiding clients away from "stupid mistakes" like performance chasing.

articles.title: CXApp Inc. (Nasdaq:CXAI) Announces the Appointment of Terry Blanchard as Senior Vice President of Engineering
articles.summary: CXApp Inc. (Nasdaq:CXAI) has announced the appointment of Terry Blanchard as Senior Vice President of Engineering. Blanchard, with over 30 years of engineering leadership experience from companies like Apple, WhatsApp, and NVIDIA, will lead CXAI's global engineering organization and drive the development of next-generation AI technologies for workplace experiences. This strategic hire aims to accelerate CXAI's product roadmap and technical strategy, focusing on creating advanced Agentic AI solutions.

articles.title: LANDSEA HOMES CLOSES ON 78 HOMESITES IN THE MOONLIGHT MASTER- PLANNED COMMUNITY IN MARICOPA, ARIZONA
articles.summary: Landsea Homes Corporation announced it has closed on 78 homesites in the Moonlight master-planned community in Maricopa, Arizona. The company will offer High Performance single- and two-story homes ranging from 1,332 to 2,624 square feet, with sales expected to launch this summer. These homes will feature smart home automation technology integrated with the Apple Home™ environment and energy-saving features.

articles.title: LANDSEA HOMES CLOSES ON 78 HOMESITES IN THE MOONLIGHT MASTER- PL
articles.summary: Landsea Homes Corporation announced it has closed on 78 homesites in the Moonlight master-planned community in Maricopa, Arizona. The community will offer a mix of High Performance single- and two-story homes featuring smart home automation technology and energy savings, with sales estimated to launch this summer. This expansion aims to meet high demand for quality, energy-efficient homes in Maricopa, an area known for its small-town feel and proximity to Phoenix.

articles.title: Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai sells $5.15 million in company stock
articles.summary: Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai recently sold approximately $5.15 million in company stock through a pre-established trading plan. The sales occurred while Alphabet's stock traded near its 52-week low, though Wall Street maintains a bullish outlook. Pichai's remaining direct holdings in Alphabet amount to over 2.7 million shares.

articles.title: Growth or Bubble? Decoding the Rapid Rise of CXAI Stock
articles.summary: CXApp Inc. (CXAI) stock is experiencing a significant rise, up 32.54%, driven by positive market sentiment and strategic advancements including the appointment of Terry Blanchard as SVP of Engineering. The company faces financial challenges, as shown by its Q3 2024 operating revenue of $1.897M against $5.223M in total expenses, but maintains a strong gross margin of 80.9%. The market awaits its rescheduled Q4 and FY24 earnings call for further insights into its AI-native platform and future trajectory.

articles.title: Visa CEO Ryan McInerney sells $3 million in stock
articles.summary: Visa CEO Ryan McInerney sold 8,620 shares of Class A Common Stock for approximately $3.02 million. This transaction occurred under a Rule 10b5-1 trading plan and near Visa's 52-week high. The article also highlights Visa's strong performance, its bid to replace Mastercard for Apple's credit card, and efforts to integrate with cryptocurrency wallets and combat scams.

articles.title: BCX: Examining Inflation Protection Benefits And Recession Risks
articles.summary: The BlackRock Resources & Commodities Strategy Trust (BCX) is a closed-end fund offering commodities exposure and a high income yield, making it attractive for inflation protection. The fund has historically performed well during inflationary periods, outperforming the S&P 500 year-to-date, and trades at a compelling discount to NAV with a significant yield and monthly distributions. While distributions have been fully covered year-to-date, they were not fully covered for the full year 2024.

articles.title: PTC Brings AI-Powered PLM to Hannover Messe 2025 with Windchill AI
articles.summary: PTC is set to preview its AI-powered Windchill AI product lifecycle management (PLM) assistant at Hannover Messe 2025, alongside Codebeamer AI and ServiceMax AI. This initiative demonstrates PTC's commitment to advancing agentic AI across the product digital thread, aiming to enhance engineers' efficiency by leveraging product data for informed decision-making and task automation. The preview will include the Document Vault AI agent, designed to extract critical product information from Windchill-stored documents.
